title: Coronavirus: Public urged to stay at home over Easter weekend
description: The Scottish government is encouraging people to avoid the temptation to go for a leisurely drive.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 The normally busy M8 has been eerily quiet since the lockdown was announced last month
People across Scotland have been urged help combat the spread of coronavirus by staying at home over the Easter weekend.
